snippet: For the big television industry event called upfront week, NBCUniversal will borrow a page from the playbook of its parent, Comcast, and bundle together its cable channels.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; NBCUniversal, preparing for big television industry event called upfront week, plans to invite ad agencies to a combined presentation of plans for the 2014-15 season by all 17 of company's cable channels; move borrows from NBC's parent company, Comcast.
lead_paragraph: For the big television industry event called upfront week, NBCUniversal will borrow a page from the playbook of its parent, Comcast, and bundle together its cable channels.

headline.main: NBCUniversal to Combine ‘Upfront’ Presentations for Its Cable Channels
headline.print_headline: NBCUniversal to Combine ‘Upfront’ Presentations for Its Cable Channels
